info.title: Finnish PHR's capability statement for acceptance testing R4
info.description: The capability statement for Kanta PHR service client software acceptance testing environment

/metadata.summary: Access to the Server's Capability Statement
/metadata.description: All FHIR Servers return a CapabilityStatement that describes what services they perform

get.summary: Return the server's capability statement

/CarePlan.summary: Manager for resources of type CarePlan
/CarePlan.description: The Manager for resources of type CarePlan: provides services to manage the collection of all the CarePlan instances

get.summary: Search all resources of type CarePlan based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: Logical id of this artifact

parameters.name: _lastUpdated
parameters.description: When the resource version last changed

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Time period the plan covers

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: Who care plan is for

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status of the plan

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Return careplans with this external identifier

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: The category for a particular careplan

parameters.name: supporting-info
parameters.description: Reference to supporting info

parameters.name: _total
parameters.description: Total count of resources

requestBody.description: The new state of the resource

200.description: the resource being returned after being updated

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

/CarePlan/{rid}.description: Access to services to manage the state of a single resource of type CarePlan

get.summary: Read the current state of the resource

put.summary: Update the current state of the resource

requestBody.description: The new state of the resource

delete.summary: Delete the resource so that it no exists (no read, search etc)

204.description: If the resource is deleted - no content is returned

/CarePlan/{rid}/_history/{hid}.description: Access a to specified previous version of a single resource of type CarePlan

/Observation.summary: Manager for resources of type Observation
/Observation.description: The Manager for resources of type Observation: provides services to manage the collection of all the Observation instances

get.summary: Search all resources of type Observation based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: Logical id of this artifact

parameters.name: _lastUpdated
parameters.description: When the resource version last changed

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Obtained date/time. If the obtained element is a period, a date that falls in the period. AND operator is supported.

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: The patient that the observation is about, mandatory search parameter

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: The code of the observation type. The following syntaxes are supported: [parameter]=[code] and [parameter]=[system]|[code]. OR operator is supported. If searching with multiple codes and code.system isn't given, default codesystem http://loinc.org will be used.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The unique id for a particular observation. The following syntaxes are supported: [parameter]=[code] and [parameter]=[system]|[code].

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: The classification of the type of observation. The following syntaxes are supported: [parameter]=[code] and [parameter]=[system]|[code].

parameters.name: _total
parameters.description: Total count of resources

requestBody.description: The new state of the resource

200.description: the resource being returned after being updated

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

/Observation/{rid}.summary: Read/Write/etc resource instance of type Observation
/Observation/{rid}.description: Access to services to manage the state of a single resource of type Observation

get.summary: Read the current state of the resource

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

put.summary: Update the current state of the resource

requestBody.description: The new state of the resource

200.description: the resource being returned after being updated

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

delete.summary: Delete the resource so that it no exists (no read, search etc)

204.description: If the resource is deleted - no content is returned

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

/Observation/{rid}/_history/{hid}.summary: Read a past version of resource instance of type Observation
/Observation/{rid}/_history/{hid}.description: Access a to specified previous version of a single resource of type Observation

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag for that version

/MedicationAdministration.summary: Manager for resources of type MedicationAdministration
/MedicationAdministration.description: The Manager for resources of type MedicationAdministration: provides services to manage the collection of all the MedicationAdministration instances

get.summary: Search all resources of type MedicationAdministration based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: Logical id of this artifact

parameters.name: _lastUpdated
parameters.description: When the resource version last changed

parameters.name: effective-time
parameters.description: Date administration happened (or did not happen)

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: The identity of a patient to list administrations for, mandatory search parameter

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Return administrations with this external identifier. The following syntaxes are supported: [parameter]=[code] and [parameter]=[system]|[code].

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: Return administrations of this medication code. The following syntaxes are supported: [parameter]=[code] and [parameter]=[system]|[code]. OR operator is supported. If searching with multiple codes and code.system isn't given, default codesystem http://phr.kanta.fi/CodeSystem/fiphr-cs-insulincode will be used.

parameters.name: _total
parameters.description: Total count of resources

requestBody.description: The new state of the resource

200.description: the resource being returned after being updated

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

/MedicationAdministration/{rid}.summary: Read/Write/etc resource instance of type MedicationAdministration
/MedicationAdministration/{rid}.description: Access to services to manage the state of a single resource of type MedicationAdministration

get.summary: Read the current state of the resource

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

put.summary: Update the current state of the resource

requestBody.description: The new state of the resource

200.description: the resource being returned after being updated

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

delete.summary: Delete the resource so that it no exists (no read, search etc)

204.description: If the resource is deleted - no content is returned

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

/MedicationAdministration/{rid}/_history.description: Access a to specified previous version of a single resource of type MedicationAdministration

/Questionnaire.summary: Manager for resources of type Questionnaire
/Questionnaire.description: The Manager for resources of type Questionnaire: provides services to manage the collection of all the Questionnaire instances

get.summary: Search all resources of type Questionnaire based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: Logical id of this artifact

parameters.name: _lastUpdated
parameters.description: When the resource version last changed

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: A code that corresponds to the questionnaire or one of its groups. The following syntaxes are supported: [parameter]=[code] and [parameter]=[system]|[code].

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: An identifier for the questionnaire. The following syntaxes are supported: [parameter]=[code] and [parameter]=[system]|[code].

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The logical URL for the questionnaire

parameters.name: _total
parameters.description: Total count of resources

requestBody.description: The new state of the resource

200.description: the resource being returned after being updated

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

parameters.description: The patient that is the subject of the questionnaire, mandatory search parameter

parameters.name: authored

parameters.name: identifier

summary.name: _summary
summary.description: Requests the server to return a designated subset of the resource

format.name: _format
format.description: Specify alternative response formats by their MIME-types (when a client is unable acccess accept: header)

pretty.name: _pretty
pretty.description: Ask for a pretty printed response for human convenience

elements.name: _elements
elements.description: Requests the server to return a collection of elements from the resource

count.name: _count
count.description: The maximum number of search results on a page. The server is not bound to return the number requested, but cannot return more
